name: @c4312/chromehash
description: A Rust/WebAssembly implementation of the Chrome content hashing algorithm

scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf pkg && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release && wasm-opt -O4 -o pkg/min.wasm pkg/chromehash_bg.wasm && mv pkg/min.wasm pkg/chromehash_bg.wasm

author: Connor Peet <connor@peet.io>
